dimensions: Sheet: 22.2 x 16.8 cm (8 3/4 x 6 5/8 in. ) (irregular sheet)
title: Design for Silver Chalice with Two Alternate Decorative Motifs
description: Presentation design for silver chalice with wide shallow cup; on cup and base alternate design motifs at left and right of vertical center fold: left half, horizontal bands of cross-hatching on cup and base; right half of cup and base, horizontal line of scallops and half a Greek cross at bottom of flared stem.
name: Drawing
